statements: UPDATE campaign_finance_data SET funds_raised = 15000.00, expenditure = 5000.00 WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE campaign_finance_data SET party_affiliation = 'Republican', contribution_limit = 10000.00 WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE campaign_finance_data SET funds_raised = 15000.75, expenditure = expenditure + 500.25 WHERE candidate_id = '3c30704d-5ed2-4baf-b5b5-4b7e44c943a5';
UPDATE campaign_finance_data SET party_affiliation = 'Independent', expenditure = expenditure * 1.1 WHERE candidate_id = 'acd63841-8266-4967-a51d-bc3682e32a00';
UPDATE campaign_finance_data SET donation_amount = 5000.00 WHERE id = 1;
